abstract: Stocks rise briskly as investors become more optimistic about global economy.
lead_paragraph: Global markets rose after Greece got approval overnight to receive the next batch of its bailout loans from its eurozone creditor nations.

headline.main: Wall St. Is Up, Led by Banks and Commodities Shares

snippet: Global markets rose after Greece got approval overnight to receive the next batch of its bailout loans from its eurozone creditor nations.
